explanation: [0-0] The video begins inside a subway car, where a blonde woman is seen from behind with her hands cuffed behind her back by a police officer. She's wearing a military green short-sleeved shirt and dark brown shorts. The police officer is in a blue-grey uniform. The floor of the subway car is dark blue with light blue seats and silver doors.

[0-5] Next, the officer pushes the woman against the subway door. A kissing emoji with floating red hearts appears in the frame and then disappears. A man with a crew cut wearing a pink T-shirt and shorts appears on the left, observing the scene. At this moment, white subtitles appear on the screen: "Lend a hand?" Below it are two option buttons: a blue "Yes" and a red "No". Then, an icon of a right hand with an extended index finger appears, selecting the "Yes" option.

[5-13] Immediately, the man in pink kicks the police officer away. He pats the woman on her left shoulder with his right hand. The woman turns around with her arms open. She has a pale face, red eyes, and her mouth is open – she has become a zombie. A scared yellow emoji appears on her chest as she lunges at the man in pink. A group of zombies with green smoke emanating from their feet follow behind her. Nine icons arranged in three rows and three columns appear on the screen: five blue icons with two crossed axes and four orange-red icons with a crossbow. The icon of the right hand with the extended index finger reappears, swapping the axe icon in the middle of the top row with the crossbow icon in the middle row, resulting in a large red cross. It then moves the last two icons in the bottom row, again displaying an error. The nine icons then disappear.

[13-19] The blonde zombie scratches the man in pink on his left arm. The man turns and runs. The scene changes to the man stopping by a subway car door, turning to face the approaching zombies. There is a mesh fence along the corridor above with three characters inside. A row of icons appears in the middle of the screen, including three red crossbow icons, three green shield icons, and three blue axe icons. The right hand with the extended index finger icon appears and moves the three red crossbow icons together, causing a shower of rubble to fall from above, crushing the zombies.

[19-26] At this moment, the mesh fence in the upper left opens and a female character with short black hair in a black and white maid outfit emerges. She wields a large axe, striking at the oncoming zombies. The man in pink lies on the ground, surrounded by green smoke. The right hand with the extended index finger appears again, swapping a green shield icon and a blue axe icon, resulting in an error. The white subtitle "potato PSEUDOG AMER" appears in the middle of the screen. All icons disappear, and the man in pink transforms into a zombie, ultimately biting and killing the woman in the maid outfit.
